Package starwars

Interface SWActionInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActionInterface, java.lang.Comparable<ActionInterface>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Attack, Dip, Fill, Leave, Move, Own, SWAction, SWAffordance, Take, Training

    public interface SWActionInterface
extends ActionInterface
    Interface that allows SWAction and SWAffordance to have a common ancestor (and thus be stored in the same structures) despite one extending Action and the other extending Affordance.
    Author:
    ram

    • Method Summary

      boolean canDo​(SWActor a)
      Returns if the given SWActor a can perform this action
      boolean isMoveCommand​()
      Returns if or not the action is a move command.

    • Method Detail

      • isMoveCommand

        boolean isMoveCommand​()
        Returns if or not the action is a move command. Returns true if so, false otherwise

      • canDo

        boolean canDo​(SWActor a)
        Returns if the given SWActor a can perform this action
        Parameters:
        a - the SWActor being queried
        Returns:
        true if a can perform this action, false otherwise

      • act

        void act​(SWActor a)
        The method that defines what needs to be performed when this action is performed.

        a - the SWActor who performs this action.
